meanings.definition: An assembly or meeting for consultation or discussion.
meanings.sent1: The neighborhood councils gathered to talk about community issues.
meanings.sent2: The city council meets every Monday to discuss new laws.
meanings.sent3: The council of animals decided to have a meeting in the forest.
meanings.sent4: In the kingdom of ants, the council of elders convenes under the oak tree.
meanings.sent5: The council of wizards convened in a magical chamber to plan their next spell.

meanings.definition: A group of people elected or appointed to make decisions or give advice.
meanings.sent1: The student council helps organize school events.
meanings.sent2: The council of ministers advised the king on important matters.
meanings.sent3: The council of superheroes debated who should lead the team.
meanings.sent4: In the land of toys, the council of stuffed animals ruled over the playroom.
meanings.sent5: The council of elders in the village provided wisdom to the young villagers.
